com.munger.passwordkeeper

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

                • com.munger.passwordkeeper.MainActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.support.v4.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class MainActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.ActionBarActivity
    This is the main activity launched by the manifest. MainActivity contains the fragments for creating new documents, importing documents, and viewing documents.

      • setEditable

        public void setEditable(boolean editable)
        Sets the editable mode for this Activity. Most of the views in this Activity have two states: editable and viewable. It works to pass on the editable information to the fragments whenever it gets set.
        Parameters:
        editable - set true to set all fragments to editable mode

      • getEditable

        public boolean getEditable()
        Get the current editable state.

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        Handle the behaviour of the back button.
        Overrides:
        onBackPressed in class android.support.v7.app.ActionBarActivity

      • openFile

        public void openFile(java.lang.String file)
        Prompt the user for a password to open the specified file. Proceed to openFile2 if the password is correct.
        Parameters:
        file - the name of the file in the filesystem to decode.

      • openFile2

        private void openFile2(java.lang.String file,
             java.lang.String password)
        Load the specified file into memory.
        Parameters:
        file - the name of the file to load in the filesystem.
        password - the password used to decrypt the file.

      • addFile

        public void addFile(int type)
        Open the fragment that allows the user to create a new document.
        Parameters:
        type - Type can either be CreateFileFragment.TYPE_CREATE or CreateFileFragment.TYPE_IMPORT

      • removeFile

        public void removeFile(java.lang.String name)
        Delete the specified file from the file system irrecoverably.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the file the delete.
